title: Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game No Akuyaku Reijou Ni Tensei Suru
alternative_title: 男子高校生、乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生する。 ; Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Suru.
status: 男子高校生、乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生する。 ; Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Suru.
description:
Description :
        One day, "I," an ordinary high school boy living in the present day, was hit by a truck and reincarnated in another world. But what a surprise it was to find out that I was reincarnated as Elena Evan, the "villainess" of an otome game!
If this continues, the future that awaits me will either be condemnation, execution, or exile... I want to avoid that at all costs. While I was worrying about this, I found a glimmer of hope. If Tiara, the main heroine, and I could get together and find a yuri route for us, maybe we could avoid a bad ending...?
However, I am now beset by a number of beautiful and handsome men...?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 7: Is This A Love Letter?
Chapter 4: A Delinquent And A Noble Lady ①
